statements.update: update ASET_REKLAS set TGLREKLAS=#Tglreklas#, KET=#Ket# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOREKLAS=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#
update ASET_REKLAS set TGLVALID = #Tglreklas# where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOREKLAS=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#

update ASET_REKLAS set TGLVALID = null where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOREKLAS=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# update ASET_REKLASDET set NOREG2 = '', STATUS = 0 where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NOREKLAS=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans#
update ASET_REKLAS set REV_BY=#Rev_by# and REV_DATE=#Rev_date#
update ASET_REKLAS set REV_BY='' and REV_DATE=null
statements.select: select A.ID, A.UNITKEY, D.KDUNIT, D.NMUNIT, A.NOREKLAS, A.KDTANS, J.NMTRANS, A.TGLREKLAS, A.TGLVALID, A.KET from ASET_REKLAS A left join DAFTUNIT D ON D.UNITKEY = A.UNITKEY left join JTRANS J ON J.KDTANS = A.KDTANS
where 1=1 and A.UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and year(A.TGLREKLAS) = (select CONFIGVAL from PEMDA where CONFIGID = 'cur_thang') order by A.TGLREKLAS, A.NOREKLAS
select COUNT(*) JMLDATA from ASET_REKLASDET A where A.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and A.NOREKLAS = #Noreklas# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and ASETKEY2 is not null
select COUNT(*) JMLASETKEYNULL from ASET_REKLASDET A where A.UNITKEY = #Unitkey# and A.NOREKLAS = #Noreklas# and A.KDTANS=#Kdtans# and ASETKEY2 is null

select sum(x.NOREKLAS) as JMLKIB from ( select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBADET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBBDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBCDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBDDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBEDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# union all select count(NODOKUMEN) as NOREKLAS from ASET_KIBGDET where UNITKEY=#Unitkey# and NODOKUMEN=#Noreklas# and KDTANS=#Kdtans# ) x
